entity.name: Cyberpunk 2077
entity.description: This entity includes all conversation about the franchise, as well as any individual installments in the series, if applicable.

text: @CyberpunkGame We are waiting for the game that is going to be the best for the next few years.We are still with COVID-19 that surely affected the development. If you guys feel sooo disappointed cancel your preorders.I bet none of you will. LOL. @CyberpunkGame take all the time you need! ❤️❤️❤️
